attributes.action: Introduce annual basic first aid training into secondary schools
attributes.additional_details:
Giving our future generations this life saving skill could make all the difference between life and death with each student having had 5 refresher days by the time they leave secondary education and be confident of when to act 
CPR is more effective the sooner it starts I don't know about anyone else but I would feel a lot safer knowing there is help nearby should the worse happen
attributes.background: Basic first aid training is something that many people only learn when life hands them a reason and many people would struggle preforming correct cpr. I would like to make it a skill that is Available to all 11 to 16 year old to learn in school as part of personal development days
